name: PHObjectChangeDetails
desc: A description of changes that occurred in an asset or collection object.

items.name: var objectBeforeChanges: ObjectType
items.desc: An object that reflects the original state of the asset or collection it represents.

items.name: var objectAfterChanges: ObjectType?
items.desc: An object that reflects the current state of the asset or collection it represents.

items.name: var assetContentChanged: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the assetâ€™s photo or video content has changed.

items.name: var objectWasDeleted: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the object has been deleted from the Photos library.

declaration: class PHObjectChangeDetails<ObjectType> : NSObject where ObjectType : PHObject
